ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of JOHN KNUBLEY of Ottawa, Ontario, to be concurrently Associate Deputy Minister of Transport and Associate Deputy Head of the Office of Infrastructure of Canada, to be styled Associate Deputy Minister of Transport, Infrastructure and Communitiesto be styled Associate Deputy Minister of Transport, Infrastructure and Communities, to hold office during pleasure, effective October 1, 2007.
